page.title: 17CRANFIELD PAST AND PRESENT.
page.content: POPULATION. Cranfields population has grown from a few hundred people to a few thousand people. The number now is over 4,000. LOCAL EVENTS. There were many important local events such as the annual show day and "Cranfield Feast Day". Both of these have gone out of existance now.The show day was held in the field oppo- site the Baptist Church. On this day a band would come. This day was around the middle of July. WOODLANDS AND WILDLIFE. The woodlands around Cranfield have decreased greatly. There have been paths worn through the fields and woods but most of these have been ploughed over. There is quite a lot of wildlife around Cranfield such as deer, rabbits, geese, ducks, hares and jays.
